== Kubuntu Hug Day 2008-03-27 ==
Here we have a sampling of bugs to work on for Hug Day.  After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after "background-color:" and before ";".  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  

You might find it more convenient to edit the wiki page using <code>editmoin</code> a command line utility for editing moinmoin wiki pages.  It is available as a package in Gutsy and Hardy.  More information including an easier way to do this was <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-bugsquad/2007-November/000666.html|mailed]]</nowiki> to the Bug Squad.

Coordination for Hug for a Bug Day happens on IRC in #ubuntu-bugs and #kubuntu-devel

== Konqueror ==
Today we will be working on bugs in Konqueror, KDE and Kubuntu's web browser and advanced file manager.

This list includes bugs in both Konqueror 3.5 and 4.0.  When trying to confirm, it is preferable to test in both versions.  If the bug is present in both versions, you should add another line to the bug to mark it against the other version as well using "Also affects Package".  Konqueror 3.5 is in package kdebase.  Konqueror 4.0 is in package kdebase-kde4.

This list was compiled using a search on launchpad.  To make working with Konqueror bugs easier in the future, please add the tag konqueror to bugs when you work on them.

=== 87 bugs in New status ===
These are untriaged or not confirmed Konqueror bugs.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Try to recreate the bug in Hardy Heron and set the status to "Confirmed" or
* Search for duplicates (and mark if found) or
* Search for the bug at bug.kde.org.  If found, link to it using "Also affects project" and if it is confirmed there set the status to "Confirmed".
